actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 3287 of title, United States Code, to authorize the crediting of prior active commissioned service in any Armed Force to officers appointed in the Regular Army.

summary.text: Authorizes the crediting of prior active commissioned service in any armed force to officers appointed in the Regular Army for the purpose of determining grade, seniority, and eligibility for promotion. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 3287(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 3287 of title, United States Code, to authorize the crediting of prior active commissioned service in any Armed Force to officers appointed in the Regular Army.
